name: Dolce Italia Chicken Lasagna
description: This chicken lasagna with minced fresh chicken breast is a traditional meat-sauce pasta gratin, easy to warm up in just a few minutes, and contains no preservatives, dyes or sugar. Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
